nodeText:
Based on the project's bibiography it is advised to
      search for existing digital resources which might be reused in the current research context.
      Browsing for digital resources might be perfomed on different platforms, e.g. VLO, Europeana,
      German Digital Library (for German resources). The primary goal here would be to find
      digitized full-texts of reliable versions of the works in consideration. However, if digitized
      full-texts are not available, text recognition has to be considered. For that, the current
      step may also include a search for digital images of the written records (Europeana, VD, KVK)
      to be used as a basis for text recognition.
